channel.title: [PI] Character login [PI]
channel.description: ok so im wanting people to log in and have a choice to be a goblin, human, dragon, or ect. but idk how to do that...it sees weird for rs but its like making another game it should get more players

item.title: [PI] Character login [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

under public void initialize()

int randomNPC = Misc.random(4);
if(randomNPC == 0) {
c.npcId2(###);
c.isNpc = true;
} else if(randomNPC == 1) {
c.npcId2(###);
c.isNpc = true;
etc....

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Character login [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

I’ve seen a source that lets you change into a werewolf and zombie through a command , big NPC’s would make you crash though…

And imo it’s pretty easy to do but not very usefull…
Unless when you are a vampire you would heal 1/4 of all the damage you deal or somthing xD

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Character login [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“patargangstar, post:3, topic:398681”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=495817.msg3624831#msg3624831 date=1307748528]
Nobody would play that game.

For example, with the current models, goblins can only wear goblin mail, and dragons have 4 legs, so you would essentially have to create armor with no torso, and 4 legs.

If you want different races, make a WoW private server.

If you want to simply change how the player looks, simply changing the npcId of the player will suffice.
[/quote]

hey you gotta give him +1 for orginality though[/quote]
Not really, we’ve seen this before.

Read full topic

For example, with the current models, goblins can only wear goblin mail, and dragons have 4 legs, so you would essentially have to create armor with no torso, and 4 legs.

item.title: [PI] Character login [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Nobody would play that game.

For example, with the current models, goblins can only wear goblin mail, and dragons have 4 legs, so you would essentially have to create armor with no torso, and 4 legs.

If you want different races, make a WoW private server.

If you want to simply change how the player looks, simply changing the npcId of the player will suffice.
